text: Kaya he loka jaminivara hindale phirale nahita ki tyanni pahile asate ki je loka yancyapurvi ho'una gele tyanca parinama (anta) kasa jhala. Te sakti ani samarthya ani dharativara apali smarake soduna janyacya adharavara yancya tulaneta khupa jasta hote, tarihi allahane tyanna tyancya aparadhampayi dharale ani asa koni ho'una gela nahi jyane tyanna allahacya siksa - yatanampasuna vacavuna ghetale asate
